text: "The Way" is a song recorded by American singer and actress Ariana Grande. It features rapper Mac Miller. The song is from Grande's first studio album Yours Truly. It reached the Top 10 in The United States and United Kingdom. It was Grande's first successful song. ==Track listings== * Digital download # "The Way" – 3:46 # "The Way" – 3:46 * CD single # "The Way" – 3:48 # "The Way" – 3:10 ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:Ariana Grande songs Category:Pop songs Category:Hip hop soul songs Category:R&B; songs
title: The Way (Ariana Grande song)
